events.message: We received an application from a highly skilled software engineer interested in our backend developer position.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate's experience aligns well with our software development role.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate’s profile and coordinate subsequent recruitment activities.
Initial phone screening completed; candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in backend development and problem-solving skills.
Candidate replied promptly, expressing enthusiasm and confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for April 16th at 10:00 AM UTC.
Candidate successfully completed the technical interview, showing excellent coding skills and system design knowledge.
HR interview has been scheduled for April 20th to discuss company culture and compensation details with the candidate.
Candidate completed HR interview and expressed strong alignment with company values and interest in the role.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate with a competitive salary and benefits package.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer and confirmed the start date as May 15th, 2024.
The new hire’s onboarding process has started smoothly, with orientation and initial training sessions scheduled.
Hiring case successfully closed after the candidate completed onboarding and officially joined the engineering team.
